atk-s0401a8:1_1: Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame kalyāṇamittatāti kalyāṇā mittā assāti kalyāṇamitto,
atk-s0401a8:3_1: Catutthe bojjhaṅgāti bujjhanakasattassa aṅgabhūtā satta dhammā.
atk-s0401a8:4_1: Pañcame bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchantīti iminā padena bojjhaṅgānaṁ yāthāvasarasabhūmi nāma kathitā .
atk-s0401a8:4_5: Tattha vipassanāya uppajjanakāle bojjhaṅgā kāmāvacarā honti,
atk-s0401a8:4_8: Iti imasmiṁ sutte bojjhaṅgā catubhūmakā kathitā.
atk-s0401a8:5_4: Tesaṁ antare bandhulamallasenāpatiṁ ārabbha ayaṁ kathā udapādi, ‘‘āvuso,
atk-s0401a8:5_5: asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe bahuñātikaṁ ahosi bahupakkhaṁ,
atk-s0401a8:5_7: Atha bhagavā tesaṁ cittācāraṁ ñatvā ‘‘mayi gate mahatī desanā bhavissatī’’ti ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma
atk-s0401a8:5_12: asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe bahuñātikaṁ ahosi bahupakkhaṁ,
atk-s0401a8:5_13: idāni appañātikaṁ appapakkhaṁ jātanti vadantā nisinnamhāti.
atk-s0401a8:6_1: Etāya hi parihāniyā saggato vā maggato vā parihāni nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a8:6_3: Etaṁ patikiṭṭhanti etaṁ pacchimaṁ etaṁ lāmakaṁ.
atk-s0401a8:6_4: Yadidaṁ paññāparihānīti yā esā mama sāsane kammassakatapaññāya jhānapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya maggapaññāya phalapaññāya ca parihāni,
atk-s0401a8:7_2: Dhammasabhāyaṁ kira nisinnesu bhikkhūsu ekacce evaṁ āhaṁsu –
atk-s0401a8:7_3: ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appañātikaṁ appapakkhaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0401a8:7_7: Satthā tesaṁ cittācāraṁ ñatvā purimanayeneva āgantvā dhammāsane nisinno ‘‘kāya nuttha,
atk-s0401a8:7_11: Satthā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a8:7_12: Tattha appamattikāti taṁ sampattiṁ nissāya saggaṁ vā maggaṁ vā sampattānaṁ abhāvato parittā.
atk-s0401a8:7_14: Tasmāti yasmā ñātīnaṁ vuddhi nāma diṭṭhadhammikamattā appā parittā,
atk-s0401a8:7_15: sā saggaṁ vā maggaṁ vā pāpetuṁ asamatthā, tasmā.
atk-s0401a8:8_2: Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ sannisinnā mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṁ ārabbha ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe mahābhogaṁ mahāhiraññasuvaṇṇaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0401a8:8_4: Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a8:9_2: Dhammasabhāyaṁ kira sannisinnā bhikkhū kākavaliyaseṭṭhiñca puṇṇaseṭṭhiñca ārabbha ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appabhogaṁ ahosi,
atk-s0401a8:9_4: Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a8:9_5: Sesaṁ imesu dvīsupi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0401a8:10_2: Dhammasabhāyaṁ kira bhikkhū kosalamahārājānaṁ ārabbha ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe mahāyasaṁ mahāparivāraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0401a8:10_4: Bhagavā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ ārabhi.
